DataElement.preferredName: Primary Cause of Death Reason Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that describes a  circumstance or condition of greatest rank or importance that resulted in the death of a living being which is different than the one(s) previously specified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs

DataElement.changeDescription: 7/21/17 jk  Added CSI per Round 5 finalization task; CDE already Standard/NCI Standard context.  4/27/16 registration set to Proposed per results of COD WG. jk  4/19/16 added alternate question to match CDE 4783273 wording "Other cause". jk 12/2/15 corrected typo in question/tt_4/28/15 Released; changed reg status to Qualified. jc  4/7/15 created based on recommendation of the COD Harmonization WG using versioned VD. jc
